tls:line.title: Translation of 陸機集十一卷 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: 患 "run into the problem" is not fear of something but exposure to a problem/danger. *意 is not philosophical "ideas men have" but autobiographic: "my ideas". *稱 refers to correspondence: "correspond properly, capture properly", not equality or balance. *物 refers not to things generally but to the things dealt with by one's 意 "ideas/notions".

sense.def: run into the problem that S, be faced with the problem that

tls:text.tls:line: 於是 "At this high pitch of excitement...". *沈 is figurative "sunken> obsolete, long forgotten". *We have to believe the old commentators that the binome 怫悅 "make their difficult appearance"refers to the "difficulty of emergence" of these phrases. The phrase does not recur elewhere in the literature. It has remained a hapax legomenon.
